title: Phantom Yuusha Densetsu
opening_song: "THE STRANGER" by Kyan Marie with MEDUSA
ending_song: "BY MY SIDE" by Kyan Marie with MEDUSA
sinopse: Yazawa, a Japanese pilot, suffers a crash in his Phantom jetfighter. After a six month recovery, his old friend from an airplane magazine wants him to investigate the appearance of a Phantom in an armed conflict in El Salvador. Yazawa's investigations makes him wind up in an international arms conspiracy. Based on a series of military fiction novels.
